fomod.Name: Atomic Muscle
fomod.Author: Ulfbearth
fomod.Description: Atomic Muscle is a body replacer based on EVB and with the same idea as SAM ( 2 Major body sliders + Genital sliders). 2 body sliders only because its easier to refit, with the downside of simple customization but can still be combined with vanilla sliders to accomplish various body shapes.
